explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions Machine Learning (ML) techniques as essential facilitators in the AI domain, particularly in solving Project Scheduling Problems (PSPs).
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper specifically cites Reinforcement Learning as one of the techniques adopted to tackle Project Scheduling Problems under a stochastic environment.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions Artificial Neural Networks as one of the techniques used in the studies reviewed, indicating relevance to neural networks.
explanations.deep learning: Given the mention of Artificial Neural Networks and the broader context of AI techniques, deep learning is implicitly relevant as a subset of machine learning techniques applied in the studies.
